author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_12_3_X`.

Includes the integration of the following JIRA tickets.

  - [CMSHLT-2210](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2210): [ECAL, PF] Update of ECAL-PFCluster calibrations used at HLT.
  - [CMSHLT-2220](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2220): [MUO] Updates for Run-3 tracking and BDT-based InsideOut seeding.
  - [CMSHLT-2222](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2222): [BTV] Update of DeepJet model.
  - [CMSHLT-2233](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2233): [TAU] Old TAU paths prescaled to 0.
  - [CMSHLT-2235](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2235): [AlCa, Tracker] Prescale of `HLT_ZeroBias_Alignment` multiplied by 6.

(The changes in CMSHLT-2233 and CMSHLT-2235 concern only prescale values, so they technically do not appear in the updates for this PR.)

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: HLT menu development for `12_3_X`
